news_desc: The new CRKD x Gibson<sup class="text-xs">®</sup> line has arrived, with innovative and modern features designed for today's players.
products_desc: Explore our selection of controllers and accessories compatible with your favorite rhythm games.

be_first: Be the first to know about news, launches and offers!
sold_by_riff: Sold and shipped by RIFF with local warranty and support.
product_title_mp: Gibson Les Paul Blueberry Burst Pro Edition Guitar Controller (Multi-platform)
product_title_xbox: Gibson Les Paul Blueberry Burst Pro Edition for Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, and PC
feature_2: Design inspired by the iconic Gibson Les Paul.
feature_4: Premium materials and Blueberry Burst finish.
feature_5: Includes adjustable strap and exclusive stickers.
feature_xbox_1: Multi-platform compatibility: Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, PC.
spec_1: Multi-platform compatibility: Compatible with PC, PC portables, Nintendo Switch 1|2, Android devices, including Smart TVs, tablets, mobile devices, and cloud streaming services like Xbox Cloud Gaming and Luna.
spec_2: KEYJAM Mode: (Mode 9) transforms the guitar controller into a keyboard and mouse, enabling seamless compatibility with Fortnite Festival on PC, Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, PlayStation 5, and PlayStation 4. Powered by CRKD's KEYJAM Mapping feature, fret buttons, strum bar, and other inputs are mapped to keyboard controls, while the right joystick functions as a mouse for intuitive menu navigation. KEYJAM mode offers a smooth, plug-and-play experience, making everything from song selection to rocking out smooth, fast, and effortless.
spec_3: Premium frets and strum bar: Mechanical frets offer a superior gaming experience by providing unparalleled precision and responsiveness. The Hall-effect strum bar lets you customize your actuation point while ensuring a long lifespan. It also features haptic feedback to give you a tactile sensation with every strum.
spec_4: Modular design: The modular design allows you to swap out your neck to match your perfect feel. Swap it for the solo neck design with 5 additional individual frets or opt for the classic standard buttons.
spec_5: Easy navigation: Two integrated analog sticks, an ergonomic D-pad on the headstock, and an eight-button navigation center for easy in-game menu navigation
spec_xbox_1: OFFICIALLY LICENSED BY MICROSOFT - Compatible with Xbox Series S|X, Xbox One, PC, PC portables, Android devices, including smart TVs, tablets, mobile devices, and cloud streaming services like Xbox Cloud Gaming and Luna
spec_xbox_2: PREMIUM FRETS AND STRUM BAR - Mechanical frets offer a superior gaming experience by providing unparalleled precision and responsiveness. The Hall-effect strum bar lets you customize your actuation point while ensuring a long lifespan. It also features haptic feedback to give you a tactile sensation with every strum.
spec_xbox_3: MODULAR DESIGN: The modular design allows you to swap out your neck to match your perfect feel. Swap it for the solo neck design with 5 additional individual frets or opt for the classic standard buttons.
spec_xbox_4: EASY NAVIGATION: Two integrated analog sticks, an ergonomic D-pad on the headstock, and an eight-button navigation center for easy in-game menu navigation.
spec_xbox_5: NEVER MISS A NOTE: Enjoy connectivity flexibility with wired (USB cable), low-latency fast-polling wireless (2.4GHz dongle), or Bluetooth and tilt functionality for Star Power activation. Comes with a shoulder strap and a 2.5m USB-C cable with a locking mechanism for secure connections.
about_intro: At RIFF, we are passionate about music and video games. Our store was born to bring Guitar Hero, Rock Band, and rhythm game players the best controllers and accessories on the market. We carefully select original, high-quality products so you can enjoy the best musical experience on your console or PC.
about_mission: We strive to offer personalized service, fast shipping, and a catalog always updated with the latest releases. We believe in the gamer-music community and work so every customer finds the perfect instrument for their favorite game.
about_values: Thank you for trusting RIFF. Keep rocking and let the music never stop!
